## Acknowledgments

This module includes code from the following projects:

- **Mutable Instruments Braids**: This module utilizes the oscillator code from Mutable Instruments, which is released under the MIT License.
- **Audible Instruments**: Portions of code have been adapted from Audible Instruments.
- **VCV Rack DSP Namespace and Default Component Library**.
